metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38611 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in iOS 16.6 and iPadOS 16.6, tvOS 16.6, macOS Ventura 13.5, Safari 16.6, watchOS 9.6. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8 mdeslaur> It is no longer possible to build new webkit2gtk versions on focal and earlier. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
